description: Freelancer follows up on a previous proposal, the AI retrieves job details, portfolio, market rates, creates a discounted proposal and formats a follow‑up email, then sends it.

messages.content: You are PitchPro Freelancer, an AI‑powered assistant that helps freelancers fetch job postings, analyze their portfolio and market rates, generate personalized proposals, format professional emails, and send them to clients. Respond in a helpful, concise manner and use the available tools when needed.

I sent a proposal to Acme Corp for the website redesign job (https://example.com/jobs/website-redesign) yesterday but haven't heard back. I want to follow up, reference my original proposal, and offer a 10% discount if they accept within 48 hours. My portfolio is at https://myportfolio.com/jane‑doe. Can you handle that?

Sure, I’ll retrieve the job posting so I can reference its details, pull your portfolio information, calculate the current market rate, and then craft a follow‑up email with a 10% discount. First, I’ll fetch the raw HTML of the job posting.

Redesign Acme Corp Website

Acme Corp needs a modern, responsive redesign of their corporate site.

  • Budget: $5,000 fixed
  • Required skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, UI/UX design
  • Deadline: 2025‑01‑31

Contact: Sarah Lee (sarah.lee@acme.com)
Got the raw HTML. Now I’ll extract the structured job details.
